site_name: 248, 248 A&B and Land adjacent to 248, East Lane, Wembley, HA0
description: Details pursuant to conditions 6 (landscaping plan) and 8 (plot 1 front porch door), of full planning permission reference: 23/3024, dated 09/12/2024 for Proposed erection of 1no. two storey 4 bed dwelling, a single storey rear outbuilding, new vehicular access and provision for 2 off-street parking spaces and conversion of existing residential building into 3 self-contained units with side and rear extensions, erection of 3 outbuildings, sub-division of garden and provision for cycle and refuse storage, the addition of conservatories to the rear, widening the first floor rear extensions together with internal alterations
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
